Texts.Chs: ^orange;火焱神器^reset;位于^green;焱狱界^reset;中，我建议你在探索中使用任何一种变形球。通往那个空间的入口位于^#c96c28;火焱地狱^reset;
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;fire artifact^reset; is found in the ^green;Burning Dimension^reset;. I advise that you get any kind of distortion sphere for this one. Portals for this dimension are located in ^#c96c28;raging infernos^reset;.
